entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -35.3°C
Wind: W 38 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
